alert.note: Alert for Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 5:32AM CDT until June 03 at 6:27PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of the Panhandle of Texas, including the following counties, Potter and Randall. * WHEN...Until 1145 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 531 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Amarillo, Canyon and Mescalero Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
